UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The presence of arginine in the Pro-Arg-Pro motif augments the lethality of proline rich antimicrobial peptides of insect source.
Literature.Author: Lele DS, Talat S, Kaur KJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.5±0.05µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=1.1±0.03µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=0.6±0.03µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4±0.50µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi Vi+(MIC=4±0.50µM)
